meaningMnemonic: When you see a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming, <radical>courage</radical> will <kanji>well up</kanji> inside you, giving you the power to save everyone before you get washed away!
readingMnemonic: Whom does that courage <kanji>well up</kanji> inside of? <reading>You</reading> (ゆう)! In fact, YOU feel like there is a never ending well of courage bursting out of you now. You are going to be a hero!
